steps.title: Draw an egg shape on your paper, but leave the top part open.
steps.content: Draw an egg shape on your paper, but leave the top part open.

steps.title: Add an oval on the left side, draw it a little inside the first shape.
steps.content: Add an oval on the left side, draw it a little inside the first shape. This will be for the thumb.

steps.title: Now for the top part that is fixed on your wrist, draw a rectangular.
steps.content: Now for the top part that is fixed on your wrist, draw a rectangular. This is the basic shape of your glove.

steps.title: Add some details.
steps.content: Add some details. Make the glove more realistic by rounding the edges, try to give it a more flexible look.

steps.title: Repeat the first 4 steps for the second glove, the left one.
steps.content: Repeat the first 4 steps for the second glove, the left one. You can position the next glove above or below the first glove, or on the same line.

steps.title: Erase all the guideline and refine it a bit if needed.
steps.content: Erase all the guideline and refine it a bit if needed.

steps.title: Connect them with laces and hang them on the wall.
steps.content: Connect them with laces and hang them on the wall.
